name: Star Ball (itch) (Arthur Resende)
description:
This is a small ball rolling game I made for a Game Development course. All you have to do is roll the ball to the finish line while collecting stars and avoid falling to accumulate points.

Controls:

W, A, S, D - Move

Space Bar - Jump

Left Shift + W, A, S, D - Move faster

Use your mouse to look around.

Attribution:

Jump sound effect by dklon at Open Game Art https://opengameart.org/users/dklon

Death sound effect by Little Robot Sound Factory www.littlerobotsoundfactory.com
